'''Hydro Mimic Finches''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble giant [[Wildlife#Finches|Finches]]. They take more damage from {{Geo}}.
